com.microsoft.azure.management.datalake.store.uploader

Interface FrontEndAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataLakeStoreFrontEndAdapterImpl

    public interface FrontEndAdapter
    The frontend adapter that must be implemented in order to execute using the multipart uploader. By implementing this contract, the multi-part uploader will execute.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendToStream(String streamPath, byte[] data, long offset, int length)
      Appends the given byte array to the end of a given stream.
      void concatenate(String targetStreamPath, String[] inputStreamPaths)
      Concatenates the given input streams (in order) into the given target stream.

      Creates a new, empty stream at the given path.

      Deletes an existing stream at the given path.

      Gets a value indicating the length of a stream, in bytes.

      Determines if the stream with given path exists.

    • Method Detail

      • createStream

        void createStream(String streamPath,
                  boolean overwrite,
                  byte[] data,
                  int byteCount)
           throws RestException,
                  IOException
        Creates a new, empty stream at the given path.
        Parameters:
        streamPath - The relative path to the stream.
        overwrite - Whether to overwrite an existing stream.
        data - The data to include in the stream during creation.
        byteCount - The number of bytes from data to include (starting at 0).
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file does not exist or is inaccessible.
        RestException - if there is a failure communicating with the service.

      • deleteStream

        void deleteStream(String streamPath,
                  boolean recurse)
           throws IOException,
                  RestException
        Deletes an existing stream at the given path.
        Parameters:
        streamPath - The relative path to the stream.
        recurse - if set to true recursively delete. This is used for folder streams only.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file does not exist or is inaccessible.
        RestException - if there is a failure communicating with the service.

      • appendToStream

        void appendToStream(String streamPath,
                    byte[] data,
                    long offset,
                    int length)
             throws IOException,
                    RestException
        Appends the given byte array to the end of a given stream.
        Parameters:
        streamPath - The relative path to the stream.
        data - An array of bytes to be appended to the stream.
        offset - The offset at which to append to the stream.
        length - The number of bytes to append (starting at 0).
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file does not exist or is inaccessible.
        RestException - if there is a failure communicating with the service.

      • streamExists

        boolean streamExists(String streamPath)
              throws RestException,
                     IOException
        Determines if the stream with given path exists.
        Parameters:
        streamPath - The relative path to the stream.
        Returns:
        True if the stream exists, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file does not exist or is inaccessible.
        RestException - if there is a failure communicating with the service.

      • getStreamLength

        long getStreamLength(String streamPath)
              throws IOException,
                     RestException
        Gets a value indicating the length of a stream, in bytes.
        Parameters:
        streamPath - The relative path to the stream.
        Returns:
        The length of the stream, in bytes.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file does not exist or is inaccessible.
        RestException - if there is a failure communicating with the service.

      • concatenate

        void concatenate(String targetStreamPath,
                 String[] inputStreamPaths)
          throws IOException,
                 RestException
        Concatenates the given input streams (in order) into the given target stream. At the end of this operation, input streams will be deleted.
        Parameters:
        targetStreamPath - The relative path to the target stream.
        inputStreamPaths - An ordered array of paths to the input streams.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file does not exist or is inaccessible.
        RestException - if there is a failure communicating with the service.
